getActiveClaimConditionId().details: At any given moment, returns the uid for the active claim condition.

getClaimConditionById(uint256).details: Returns the claim condition at the given uid.

getSupplyClaimedByWallet(uint256,address.details: Returns the supply claimed by claimer for a given conditionId.

setClaimConditions((uint256,uint256,uint.details: Lets a contract admin set claim conditions.

verifyClaim(uint256,address,uint256,addr.details: Checks a request to claim NFTs against the active claim condition's criteria.

documentation.text: @dev The active conditions for claiming tokens.

statements.documentation:
The mapping `supplyClaimedByWallet` uses a claim condition's UID as a key.
  If `_resetClaimEligibility == true`, we assign completely new UIDs to the claim
  conditions in `_conditions`, effectively resetting the restrictions on claims expressed
  by `supplyClaimedByWallet`.

Gas refunds (as much as possible)
  If `_resetClaimEligibility == true`, we assign completely new UIDs to the claim
  conditions in `_conditions`. So, we delete claim conditions with UID < `newStartIndex`.
  If `_resetClaimEligibility == false`, and there are more existing claim conditions
  than in `_conditions`, we delete the existing claim conditions that don't get replaced
  by the conditions in `_conditions`.

documentation.text: @dev Lets a contract admin set claim conditions.
@dev Checks a request to claim NFTs against the active claim condition's criteria.
@dev At any given moment, returns the uid for the active claim condition.
@dev Returns the claim condition at the given uid.
@dev Returns the supply claimed by claimer for a given conditionId.
@dev Exposes the ability to override the msg sender.
@dev Collects and distributes the primary sale value of NFTs being claimed.
@dev Determine what wallet can update claim conditions
